11:31 <ravigarg27> yeah just a minute 11:39 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 11:45 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 11:51 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 11:56 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 11:59 <sdumitriu1> ravigarg27: Left some comments 11:59 <ravigarg27> thanks, will go through 11:59 <ravigarg27> and report back 11:59 <ravigarg27> :) 12:00 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 12:02 <sdumitriu1> As I said yesterday, the latest screenshots look really promising 12:02 <sdumitriu1> It's not perfect, but it shows that the project goal is achievable 12:04 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 12:08 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 12:10 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu1: 12:10 <kushalkhandelwal> Sorry was out 12:10 <kushalkhandelwal> Had a meeting with director today 12:10 <sdumitriu1> And what's the verdict?
